description:
A short but action-packed canyon hiding in plain sight near the exit of Eaton Canyon.

Approach

Take the Altadena Crest Trail and climb the firebreak to the transmission towers. At the towers, turn east and descend the ridge through some brush to the drop-in.

Descent

The canyon starts off with dirt mixed with rock but the rock quality gets better as you descend.

R1: 70' - tree

R2: 90' - tree, multi-step

R3: 60' - tree (banner photo)

R4: 15' - tree

R5: 25' - bush

R6: 60' - bush, multi-step

Exit

The final rappel drops you on the Eaton Canyon Falls Tail between the two dams so the exit is a breeze.
